flounder.fbos

Class FBOBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.fbos.FBOBuilder

  • public class FBOBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class capable of setting up a FBO.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected FBOBuilder(int width, int height)
      Creates a class to setup a FBO.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FBOBuilder antialias(int samples)
      Sets antialiased to true and adds samples.
      FBOBuilder attachments(int attachments)
      Sets the amount of colour attachments to create.
      FBO create()
      Creates the FBO off of the builders parameters.
      FBOBuilder depthBuffer(DepthBufferType type)
      Sets the type of depth buffer to use.
      FBOBuilder fitToScreen(float sizeScalar)
      Sets if the FBO will be fit to the screen.
      FBOBuilder nearestFiltering()
      Sets the texture to not use linear filtering.
      FBOBuilder noColourBuffer()
      Disables the colour buffer.
      FBOBuilder repeatTexture()
      Sets the texture to repeat.
      FBOBuilder withAlphaChannel(boolean alpha)
      Enables / disables the alpha channel.

      • antialias

        public FBOBuilder antialias(int samples)
        Sets antialiased to true and adds samples.
        Parameters:
        samples - How many MFAA samples should be used on the FBO. Zero disables multisampling.
        Returns:
        this.

      • attachments

        public FBOBuilder attachments(int attachments)
        Sets the amount of colour attachments to create.
        Parameters:
        attachments - The amount of attachments to create.
        Returns:
        this.

      • fitToScreen

        public FBOBuilder fitToScreen(float sizeScalar)
        Sets if the FBO will be fit to the screen.
        Parameters:
        sizeScalar - A scalar factor between the FBO and the screen, enabled when fitToScreen is enabled. (1.0f disables scalar).
        Returns:
        this.
